author: makortel
body:
#### PR description:

Allowing the function to be added to the global list is not thread safe.

Resolves https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/issues/48772
Resolves https://github.com/cms-sw/framework-team/issues/1530

#### PR validation:

Code compiles
title: Avoid adding TF2 and TF3 to global list of functions
